testsuite.name: Testing different requests like CREATE, READ, UPDATE and DELETE on Stores Endpoint of the BestBuy API playground application.

testcase.name: Check if the Stores data can be accessed by user
Check if user can CREATE a new store on stores endpoint
Check if user can READ a newly created store on stores endpoint
Check if user can UPDATE a newly created store on stores endpoint
Check if user can delete a newly created store on stores end point
